The Joe Biden Generator

January 21, 2017

My latest, possibly soon-to-be-abandoned side-project is a Joe Biden generator - a single page application where a user clicks a button to randomly generate a Joe Biden Onion story.

I’m about halfway there. Here’s a link to the code which scrapes all of the Onion stories and outputs them to a JSON file. Next up: final data cleaning and designing the damn thing.
